Package game

package game
  • Class
    Description
    ASToD
    This is a tower defense game
    EmptyGameException
    Exception to flag litteraly empty game file
    Game
    Initiates the game and loops through levels
    InvalidLevelException
    Generic class for reporting level file issues
    Level
    A level consists in a map, waves and a game loop to get through for the player
    NoSuchGameException
    Thrown when the asked games does not exist
    Player
    Class used to represent the player and the ally base, used to buy towers and physically placed at the center of the base as the enemies' target
